description: Created by the Open Liberty observability team

panels.description: The total number of CPU threads available to the JVM.
panels.title: Available CPUs

panels.description: The portion of CPU available to each Liberty instance that has been used within the last ${dur} on average.
panels.title: Process CPU Time

panels.description: For CPUs Liberty is running on, the average number of runnable entities that have been scheduled or executed by the system, over the last minute.
panels.title: CPU System Load

panels.description: Instances that are currently utilizing more than [$heapUsageThreshold%] of their configured maximum heap size.
panels.title: Instances Above [$heapUsageThreshold%] Heap Usage

panels.description: Instances with an increase in heap usage within the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Increasing Heap Usage Trend Based on Last ${dur}

panels.description: Instances projected to reach their maximum heap size within [$maxHeapUsageProjection hour(s)] based on  data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Servers That May Reach Max Heap Usage Within [$maxHeapUsageProjection hour(s)] Based on Last ${dur}

panels.description: An instance's maximum heap size.
panels.title: Configured Maximum Heap Size

panels.description: The percentage of heap memory currently in use.
panels.title: Heap Usage Percentage

panels.description: The average response time for requests made to a particular REST resource, across all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Slowest REST Resources Over Last ${dur} by Average Response Time

panels.description: The number of visits made to a REST resource instance within the past ${dur}.
panels.title: REST Request Count Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average response time for a request made to a REST resource instance, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Response Time per REST Request Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The sum of visits to a particular REST resource over all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Request Count by REST Resource Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average response time for requests made to a particular REST resource method, across all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Response Time per Request Over Last ${dur} by REST Resource

panels.description: Percentage of calls which resulted in a failure.
panels.title: Failure Rate Over Last $dur Aggregated Over $instance Instance(s)

panels.description:
Percentage of calls which resulted in a failure.

This graph is showing failures after all fault tolerance processing has taken place (including fallback)

targets.expr:
topk(5, 
sum without (result, fallback)(rate(base_ft_invocations_total{instance=~'$instance', result='exceptionThrown'}${dur})) * 100 
/ 
sum without (result, fallback)(rate(base_ft_invocations_total{instance=~'$instance'}${dur})) 
) 
> 0

panels.title: Top 5 Most Frequently Failing Methods Over Last $dur

panels.description: Percentage of method invocations which resulted in the fallback method or handler being called over the past $dur.
panels.title: Fallback Rate Over Last $dur Aggregated Over $instance Instance(s)

panels.description: Percentage of calls which resulted in the Fallback method or handler being called over the last $dur

targets.expr:
topk(5, 
sum without (result, fallback)(rate(base_ft_invocations_total{instance=~'$instance', fallback='applied'}${dur})) * 100 
/ 
sum without (result, fallback)(rate(base_ft_invocations_total{instance=~'$instance'}${dur})) 
) 
> 0

panels.title: Top 5 Methods Most Frequently Applying Fallback Over Last $dur

panels.description: Percentage of method invocation which retried at least once over the last $dur.
panels.title: Retried Rate Over Last $dur Aggregated Over $instance Instance(s)

panels.description: Percentage of calls which apply at least one Retry over the last $dur.

targets.expr:
topk(5, 
sum without (retried, retryResult)(rate(base_ft_retry_calls_total{instance=~'$instance', retried='true'}${dur})) * 100 
/ 
sum without (retried, retryResult)(rate(base_ft_retry_calls_total{instance=~'$instance'}${dur})) 
) 
> 0

panels.title: Top 5 Methods Most Frequently Applying A Retry Over Last $dur

panels.description: The average response time for requests made to a particular servlet, across all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Slowest Servlets Over Last ${dur} by Average Response Time

panels.description: The number of visits made to a servlet instance within the past ${dur}.
panels.title: Request Count Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average response time for a request made to a servlet instance, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Response Time per Request Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The sum of visits to a particular servlet over all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Request Count by Servlet Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average response time for requests made to a particular servlet, across all servers, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Response Time per Request Over Last ${dur} by Servlet

panels.description: The number of servlet requests that are currently running but are slow.
panels.title: Currently Slow Requests

panels.description: The number of servlet requests that are currently running but are hung.
panels.title: Currently Hung Requests

panels.description: The total number of connection requests that were used over the last ${dur}. Any connections that are currently in use are not included in this total.
panels.title: Connections Used Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The total number of connection requests that waited for a connection because of a full connection pool over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Connection Requests Queued Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average time any used connection was put in use, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Time Usage per Connection Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average wait time for any queued connection request, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Average Wait Time per Queued Connection Request Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The sum of managed connections in the free, shared, and unshared pools.
panels.title: Managed Connections

panels.description: The number of managed connections in the free pool.
panels.title: Free Connections

panels.description: The number of connections that are in use. This number might include multiple connections that are shared from a single managed connection.
panels.title: Connection Handles

panels.description: The total number of managed connections created since the pool was created.
panels.title: Create Total

panels.description: The total number of managed connections destroyed since the pool was created.
panels.title: Destroy Total

panels.description: A session is considered active if the application server is processing a request that uses that user session.
panels.title: Active Sessions

panels.description: A session is considered live if the session is loaded into memory by the application server.
panels.title: Live  Sessions

panels.description: The size of the Default Executor thread pool in each instance, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Largest Threadpool Sizes Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The number of threads that are actively running tasks.
panels.title: Active Threads

panels.description: The size of the Default Executor thread pool in each instance.
panels.title: Threadpool Size

panels.description: Instances that spent more than [$garbageCollectionThreshold%] of the time garbage collecting, during the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Instances With > [$garbageCollectionThreshold]% of Time Spent Garbage Collecting During Last ${dur}

panels.description: The portion of time an instance spent on a specific type of garbage collection, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Most Time Spent on Garbage Collection Over Last ${dur}

panels.description: The average time an instance took on a specific type of garbage collection, based on data over the last ${dur}.
panels.title: Time per Garbage Collection Cycle ${dur} moving average

panels.description: The time elapsed since the start of the JVM.
panels.title: JVM Uptime

title: Open Liberty
